page.title: 17Clubs
page.content: There were so many clubs and societies in the Soulbury-Linslade area that it is impossible to list them all. This shows how the area is flourishing. Soulbury has a Womens Institute, Womens Fellowship, Cricket Club, Environment group and Social Circle. Linslade has many playgroups, mother and toddler groups, Cub, Scout Brownie and Guide troops. It has a Citizens Advice Bureau, Old Peoples Welfare Association, Horticultural Society and Natural History Society. Some other groups listed are a club for the physically handicapped, Silhouette Slimming Club, NSPCC, Morris-men, a Potters Guild, a Motorcycle Club, an Adult Literacy group, an Art Society, a Festival Singers group, a Toy Library and an Astronomical Society. All interests are catered for in this area.
